valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 7 Feb 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 8 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low Fastnet 984 expected Scotland 995 by 0600 Sunday

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 later in northeast.
Sea state
In southwest, rough or very rough. in northeast, moderate or rough, occasionally very rough.
Weather
In southwest, occasional sleet. In northeast, occasional sleet.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally poor. In northeast, good, occasionally poor.

In south, rain at times. In north, rain or showers.

In south, moderate or good, occasionally poor. In north, good, occasionally poor.
